string.text: Kill the leader of the bandits
Kill the leader of the Black Slugs
Kill the leader of Clear Sky
The dangerous representatives of various stalker clans that pose a threat to the Zone must be exterminated.
Kill the Swamp Doctor and obtain the key
Crow has instructed you to take away a key from the Doctor. The purpose of the assignment is not clear, but Crow has promised to explain himself.
You must enter room 26 of the Polissya hotel and retrieve what belongs to Sin.
Obtain and retrieve the blueprints of the experimental weapons
Sabotage: join the ranks of the enemy
You have been called to infiltrate DutyТs base under the guise of a free stalker and offer Voronin СhelpТ.
Blitzkrieg: Talk to Morpheus
The brothers have come to your rescue. Morpheus, the commander, may know what comes next.
In debt: Meet with Anubis
Anubis could use some assistance.
In debt: Find and retrieve a rare plant
Anubis has instructed you to find a black cat flower for a medicinal potion. According to his information, it can be found near an acid anomaly near the Jupiter plant.
In debt: Speak to Shaman
Shaman is no longer threatened by the illness. You must speak to him.
Counter-attack: meet with the detachment
ќ местоположении отр€да € сообщил. “еперь осталось отправитьс€ туда с весточкой
Negation: justify before the general
Return to the Bar and report your version on what has happened to General Voronin.
Report: speak to Crow
All that is left is to report back to Raven about the completed task.
Respond to the brothersТ call for help
A message has appeared in your PDA asking for help. The brothers are waiting.
Courier
Crash has asked you to meet with the research squad of the Monolith in laboratory X-8 and retrieve results of their research.
Coincidence?
Charon will want to know about what has happened in the laboratory. How did those degenerates know?
Regroup with a squad of brothers
You must meet with a Monolith detachment in the Red Forest.
Inquisition
The brothers must be avenged for the death of your brothers. You must also retrieve some necessary information.
Eye of the Zone
Charon has instructed you to eliminate an unusual Sinner hiding in the town of Bright Path and retrieve information.
Better late than never
Crash may have use for NeuronТs device with information about the Rainbow emitter.
